name: Dr. Amina Okafor
bio: Dr. Okafor specializes in circular economy and sustainable waste management systems with over 15 years of experience across African contexts.

name: Prof. John Mensah
bio: Professor Mensah focuses on policy analysis and institutional frameworks for waste management in West African nations.

name: Dr. Sarah Kimani
bio: Dr. Kimani leads the data collection and analysis efforts, developing innovative methodologies for waste management metrics.

name: Dr. Mohamed Hassan
bio: Dr. Hassan's research focuses on coastal and marine waste management with expertise in community-based approaches.
